page.title: 07BIRSTALL POST IN JULY 1985
page.content: This edition of the Birstall Post contained the headline, "Day of Reckoning" with a report about our visit to the office and information about the{Domesday Project.}The completion of the BMX track and the second anniversary of the Post was also noted. On the letters page there was an angry letter from one Parish councillor to another about a Parish Council Election voting problem. The Diary page mentioned a CND meeting, several Whist Drives, the Leicester Co-op Gala, a Bring and Buy sale, the Birstall Birdwatching Club and St.James Young Families. A plastic duck race on the river in aid of the Baby Unit at the Leicester Royal Infirmary and a 20 mile sponsored walk for the Highcliffe Pool Cover Fund both raised Â£2000.
